overview: David Womark - Master of erotica Zalman King brings you the long-running Showtime series "Red Shoe Diaries," a collection of erotic writings that come to life and sizzle on the screen -- and are guaranteed to make the heart skip a beat or two. This disc contains the episodes "Hotline," "Gino" and "Love at First Sight." -  Anthony Addabbo, Don Bloomfield, St√©phane Bonnet
title: Red Shoe Diaries 9: Hotline
